name: Ordleway
description:
Pig Latin Rules: 
  • If a word starts with a consonant and a vowel, put the first letter of the word at the end of the word and add "ay" 
  •  If a word starts with two or more consonants, move the consonants to the end of the word and add "ay" 
  •  If a word starts with a vowel (NOT including "y"), add "yay" at the end of the word
How to Play Ordleway:
  • Guess words in Pig Latin to uncover the answer
  • After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word
    • Green: the letter is in the correct spot
    • Yellow: that letter is in the wrong spot
    • Grey: the letter is not in the word
  • The answer is a 7-letter Pig Latin word. This means that the base word is either a 5-letter word starting with a consonant or a 4-letter word starting with a vowel (See Pig Latin Rules)
  • A new Ordleway is available to play each day! (Midnight in your timezone)
